title: Peterhead 2-0 Airdrieonians: Match Report
text:
Peterhead 2-0 Airdrieonians: Match Report 24 Oct 2015 16:31:00 
comments Rory McAllister helps Peterhead overcome AirdrieoniansRory McAllister and Leighton McIntosh scored the goals as Peterhead beat Airdrieonians 2-0 to record their first Scottish League One win since August.Peterhead took the lead in the 42nd minute when McAllister fired home his 14th goal of the season.Airdrieonians substitute Bryan Prunty had a header saved by Peterhead goalkeeper Graeme Smith as the visitors pushed for an equaliser after the break.But McIntosh came off the bench to end Airdrieonians' hopes of a comeback with a right-footed strike which confirmed a victory which moves Peterhead to within two points of their rivals.
